resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Add
options.action: Add a user to a list

options.name: Remove
options.description: Remove a user from a list
options.action: Remove a user from a list

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the event to track
name.ai_hint: The name of the event to track

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: channelUnsubscribe
options.description: Whether to unsubscribe email from list's associated channel - essentially a global unsubscribe

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

identifier.name: identifier
identifier.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

preferUserId.name: preferUserId
preferUserId.description: Whether to create a new user if the idetifier does not exist

by.name: by
by.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

userId.name: userId
userId.description: Unique identifier for a particular user
userId.ai_hint: Unique identifier for a particular user

listId.name: listId
listId.description: Identifier to be used. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
listId.ai_hint: Identifier to be used. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'event' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'track' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'track' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'identifier'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'value'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'upsert' AND identifier == 'userId' THEN SHOW parameter 'preferUserId'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'by'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'delete' AND by == 'userId' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'delete' AND by == 'email' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'by'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'get' AND by == 'userId' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'get' AND by == 'email' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'userList' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'userList' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'listId'
IF resource == 'userList' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'identifier'
IF resource == 'userList' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'value'
IF resource == 'userList' AND operation == 'remove' THEN SHOW parameter 'listId'
IF resource == 'userList' AND operation == 'remove' THEN SHOW parameter 'identifier'
IF resource == 'userList' AND operation == 'remove' THEN SHOW parameter 'value'
IF resource == 'userList' AND operation == 'remove' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
